title: NFL ATL: Week 6 Preview
itunes:title: NFL ATL: Week 6 Preview
description:
A room full of heroes, Gregg Rosenthal, Marc Sessler and Chris Wesseling are joined by Handsome Hank to preview all of the upcoming action in Week 6. NFL Network’s Daniel Jeremiah also joins the show to help the gang look ahead. The crew also defends its hero picks and recaps the “Thursday Night Football” matchup between the New York Giants and Chicago Bears. Join the conversation on Twitter: @NFL_ATL or #NFLATL.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
